original: Bruce, Fritz Bertil, domkyrkokomminister, Skara, f. 29/5/04 i Gbg av fotograf Fritz B. o. Hedvig Michelsen. G. 31 m. fil. mag. Gunvor Johansson. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 23, fil. kand. 26, teol. kand. 29, prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Skara stift 30. Tjg. i Herrljunga o. Saleby, kommin. i Väne-Åsaka 32, domkyrkokommin. i Skara sed. 39. Pens:styr. omb. f. Skara-Valleomr., led. av kyrkofullm. sed. 45, sekr. i Skara stiftsråd, ordf. i fören. Barnens vänner, ordf. i Skara stads ungd:råd, verkst. led. av fadderortsrör. länskomm. f. Skarab. l.
translated: Bruce, Fritz Bertil, cathedral chaplain, Skara, b. May 29, 1904 in Gothenburg to photographer Fritz B. and Hedvig Michelsen. Married in 1931 to Gunvor Johansson, a graduate in philosophy. Completed secondary school in Gothenburg in 1923, earned a Bachelor's degree in philosophy in 1926, a Bachelor's degree in theology in 1929, completed practical theology training and was ordained as a priest of the Skara diocese in 1930. Employed in Herrljunga and Saleby before becoming chaplain in Väne-Åsaka in 1932, and eventually becoming a cathedral chaplain in Skara in 1939. Serves on the pension board for Skara-Valle district, has been a member of the church council since 1945, secretary of the Skara diocese council, chairman of the Children's Friends association, chairman of the Skara city youth council, and executive member of the baptismal place county committee for Skaraborg county.

memberOf.name: Baptismal Place County Committee for Skaraborg County

education.name: Practical Theology Training
education.description: Completed practical theology training and was ordained as a priest of the Skara diocese in 1930.
